actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1734.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the tax status of certain industrial development bonds issued to provide facilities for the furnishing of water including water used to cool thermal generating plants or to generate hydroelectric energy.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1734) Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax exclusion for the interest on governmental industrial development bonds the proceeds of which are used for facilities to furnish water to be used for cooling purposes in connection with a facility for generating electric energy by steam.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the tax status of certain industrial development bonds issued to provide facilities for the furnishing of water including water used to cool thermal generating plants or to generate hydroelectric energy.
